13640.「義賊のヤツらめ……。\n なぜ このオレが あの偽善者どもに\n 引けを とら:
You righteous bastards... why should I give in
to those hypocrites?

13641.「オレが 間違ってるっていうのか！？\n 答えろよ ギャスモン！:
Are you saying I'm wrong? Answer me,
Buntzenberner!

13642.「答エナド 必要ナイ。\n 汝ハ 求メレバ 得ラレルノダ。\n ソノ欲望コソガ:
There is no need for an answer. You seek and
you shall find. Sono desire is your ability...

13643.「へへっ そうか。それじゃあ\n 今よりも 強い魔物を操るチカラをくれ！\n 旅:
Heh, I see. Then give me the power to control
monsters stronger than ever! I'll make the
brigade even bigger!

13644.「マタ 魔物ヲ 操ルちからカ……。\n ソロソロ 汝自身 強クナル\n 必要ガ:
You have the power to control monsters... but
you need to be strong yourself, Squid. I don't
know...?

13645.「ソノ手デ 憎シミヲ 断ツタメニ……。: Sono, to cut off the hatred with your hands...

13646.「ホウラ……。ソノコトヲ告ゲル\n 使者ガ 来タヨウダ……。: Sono... a messenger came to tell you that...

13647.「何しにきやがった。\n オレを 正しい道に進ませようとか\n ふざけたこと 考:
What are you doing here? I hope you're not
thinking of setting me on the right path.

13648.「チッ！ 親父と同じ 偽善者の目……。\n その目を見てると むしずが走るぜ！\:
Damn! You have the same hypocritical eyes as my father... and I can feel a twinge in my gut when I look into them! Do you know what you
did to my father?

13649.「ムーチョが 町長の家に盗みに入った日……\n オレの母さんは 生死の境を さま:
The day Mucho robbed the mayor's house my
mother was on the verge of death. After years
of illness.

13650.「うちは 貧乏でよ。薬を買う金もなかった……。\n そんなとき 町長の財宝を持っ:
We were poor. We didn't have money to buy
medicine... then Mucho came to our house with
the mayor's treasure. I did a little dance!

13651.「……けどよ！ ムーチョは……\n 親父は 母さんの まくらもとに立っても\n:
But... but! Mucho... my father stood at Mom's
bedside and left without leaving anything
behind!

13652.「次の日に 母さんは 死んだよ。\n 親父は泣いてたが 今思えば あのときの涙も:
Mom died the next day. Dad was crying, but
looking back now, I'm sure his tears were just
a few inches long.

13653.「オレは ムーチョへの復讐を誓い 家を出た。\n ……そして ここにいるギャスモ:
I left home, swearing revenge on Mucho. And
then I met Buntzenberner here and received the
power to control monsters!

13654.「盗賊なんて しょせん悪党……。\n そのことを 世間に教えてやるために\n つ:
Thieves are just villains... and that's why I
formed the Whirlwind Brigade, to teach the
world that!

13655.「でもよ…… もう つむじ風の旅団なんて\n まわりくどいことは やめるぜ。\n:
But I'm not going to be a part of the
Whirlwind Brigade anymore. I'm going to kill
you all myself!

13656.「ギャスモン！ さあ オレにチカラをくれ！\n こいつらを ひねりつぶすための\:
Buntzenberner! Come on, give me the power!
Give me the power to crush them!

13657.「スベテハ 欲望ノ オモムクママニ……。: I want to be a part of your life...

13658.「おお…… みなぎる みなぎるぞ！！！\n 黒いチカラが オレの身体に………ッ！:
Oh, it's coming, it's coming, it's coming,
it's coming! The black power of my body!

13660.「ブルルルルッ！\n すべての義賊に 死を……！\n 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ:
Brrrrrrr! Death to all the bandits! Death...
death...!

13661.「ブルルルルッ！！ 何度来ても同じこと！\n 貴様ら 義賊は オレには勝てん！！:
Brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!!!! I keep coming back and I keep getting the same thing! You righteous bastards are no match for me! I'm
the one who's right!

13662.「ブルルルルッ！\n すべての義賊に 死を……！\n 死を 死をォォォ…………ッ:
Brrrrrrr! Death to all the bandits! Death...
death...!

13663.「ブ…ブルルルル……。\n 憎しみに身をまかせ チカラを得た\n このオレが な:
I, who have been empowered by my hatred, how
did I become a righteous bandit...

13664.「憎しみが 足りないのか……？\n 義賊を…… 親父を 憎む心が……。:
Not enough hatred for...? Hate for the
bandit... hate for my father...

13665.「この バカ息子ーーーーー！！！: You stupid son of a bitch!

13666.「アンタは 母親の思いを 踏みにじる気かい！！\n 妻を救えなかった 親父さんの:
You're trying to trample on your mother's feelings! Have you ever given a thought to how your father felt when he couldn't save his
wife?

13667.「アンタの親父さんね このままじゃいけないって\n あたいに 真相を話してくれた:
Your father told me the truth because he
didn't want things to go on like this. You,
too, listen with your ears open!

13668.「……町長の家に盗みに入った あの日\n ワシは お前の母を 助けられるだけのカ:
That day I robbed the mayor's house, I was
going to leave enough money to help your
mother.

13670.「私たちの約束を 忘れたのですか……。\n そう言って カネを置いていくことを\: He was very anxious to leave the money behind.

13671.「約束……？\n 約束って なんだよ……？: Promise...? What do you mean by promise...?

13672.「ワシが ムーチョになると決めたとき\n 妻は いっさいの盗品を 自分たちのため:
When I decided to become a moochie, my wife
asked me to promise not to use any of the
stolen goods for ourselves.

13673.「盗んだものを 少しでも 自分たちのために\n 使ってしまえば それは義賊ではな:
He told them that if they used even a little
of what they had stolen for themselves, they
were not righteous thieves, but mere slobs.

13674.「そして 私利私欲のために 動くのではなく\n 人のために尽くすことを 固く誓い:
And so, with a firm vow to serve others and
not for personal gain, I became Mucho...

13675.「ねえ チャムール。\n ふたりの心意気……。\n アンタには もう わからない:
Hey, Chamour. Don't you know what it's like to
be you two?

13676.「この オルゴールの音色を聞いても\n 母親の優しさを 思いだせなかったのかい？:
Did the sound of this Music Box not remind you
of your mother's kindness?

13679.「憎シミノ心ガ 消エタ……。\n コノ器ハ 使エヌ。欲望ガ足リヌ……。:
The heart of hatred is gone... the vessel
cannot be used. The desire is not enough...

13681.「すまなかったなあ チャムール……。\n もう お前を ひとりにはせん。\n や:
I'm sorry, Chamour... but I won't leave you
alone anymore. Let's start over. With me.

13682.「……グスッ。ダメだね……。\n あたい こういうのには 弱いんだ。:
I can't do it... It's no good... I have a
weakness for this kind of thing.

13683.「……さてと これにて 一件落着だね。\n つむじ風の旅団も いなくなったし\n:
Well, I guess that settles it. The Whirlwind
Brigade is gone, and the rancor between
Budecho and the others has dissipated.

13684.「<cs_pchero> 今回も また大活躍だったね。\n その礼をするからさ\:
<cs_pchero> You did a great job again this
time. To thank you for that, please come to
Gatara's tavern.

13685.「では ワシから 礼をさせてくれ。: Then allow me to thank you.

13686.「<pc>よ。\n お前には オルゴールの件や\n 今回の件で 本当に 世話にな:
<pc>. I really appreciate all the
help you've given me with Music Box and this
whole thing.

13687.「その恩返しに 盗賊の必殺技を\n お前に 伝授しよう。\n さあ 目を つむる:
To repay the favor, I'll teach you a special
technique for thieves. Now, close your eyes.

13689.「その恩返しに これを受け取ってくれ。\n 大事に 使うんだぞ。:
Take this to repay the favor. Take good care
of it.

13690.「お前は 盗賊を極められる器だ。\n 時が満ちたら ワシの所へ来るがいい。\n:
You are a master thief. Come to me when the
time is right. Of course, don't forget to be a
thief.

13691.「とっておきの 試練を用意しといてやろう。\n では またな。: I've prepared a trial for you. See you later.

13692.「ブ…ブデチョのオッサン！\n あ！ いや！ ムーチョ先生っ！！: B...Budecho's old man! Ah! No! Mr. Mucho!

13693.「あたいを 弟子にしてくれないかい！？\n あたい マスク・ド・ムーチョに あこ:
Will you take me as your apprentice? I've
always wanted to be a Masc de Mucho, so I
jumped into this world! Please!

13694.「すまんな。ワシは もう\n 弟子は とらないことにしてるんだ。:
I'm sorry. I've decided not to take on any
more apprentices.

13695.「もう……ってことは\n すでに お弟子さんが いるのかい！？: So... you already have a student?

13696.「どこで ワシの正体を知ったのか\n ちょっと前に 怪盗ポイなんとかって女の子が:
I don't know where she found out who I am, but
a little while ago, a girl called "Phantom
Thief Poi something" came to my place.

13697.「もともと 弟子をとるつもりは なかったが\n かわいい顔で 熱心に頼みこんでき:
I had no intention of taking on an apprentice,
but when he asked so enthusiastically with his
cute face, I couldn't resist.

13698.「ところが そのコ なかなか スジがよくて\n 今は 彼女の指導で 手いっぱいな:
However, this girl is pretty good at what she does, and right now I've got my hands full teaching her. That's why I'm sorry. Ha-ha-ha-
ha.
